failure.message: anchors list should be the same expected:<[an education health and care (EHC) plan, Get career ideas and browse your training options, Benefits for your business, Cost, Your responsibilities, Find out more, read guidance on GOV.UK, the Internships Work lead for your region, Employing disabled people and people with health conditions, Support with employee health and disability service]> but was:<[an education health and care (EHC) plan, Get career ideas and browse your training options, Benefits for your business, Cost, Case studies, Your responsibilities, Find out more, read guidance on GOV.UK, the Internships Work lead for your region, Employing disabled people and people with health conditions, Support with employee health and disability service]>
